TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_Tjavualji, title = Tjavualji, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tjavualji} }

S.FORM: alang Tjavualji ga niya mki sku Tayto Keng atu Tayimari go, kwara sali buwan nya ga 884 buwan, 2,112 hi ku kwara s'uli tayan. s'uli tayan pinspngan Gyencumin ga 41% kyan ku 863 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahun sku pinspngan Gyencumin ga 59% kyan ku 1,249 hi nya. pinspung na linhuyan Gyencumin ga, Paywan 34%, Amis 4%, Rukay 1%, Puyuma 1%. rhzyal kki'an tay mkraya' na Tjavualji hya' ga Lupakatj. tay mkyahu' na Tjavualji hya' ga Takidis. rekisi kayal kyokay qalang Tjavualji ga ungat kyokay. ssquliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan pqwasan biru 'laqi' cikuy maki 1 pqwasan biru 'laqi' cikuy. pqwasan biru 'laqi' mrkyas maki 1 pqwasan biru 'laqi' mrkyas. tuqi 'san basu kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbahu Ubuy qqmayh

alang Tjavoalji ga niya mki sko Tayto Keng ato Tayimari go, kwara sali bowan nya ga 884 bowan, 2,112 hi ko kwara s'oli tayan. s'oli tayan pinspngan Gyencomin ga 41% kyan ko 863 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahon sko pinspngan Gyencomin ga 59% kyan ko 1,249 hi nya. pinspong na linhoyan Gyencomin ga, Paywan 34%, Amis 4%, Rokay 1%, Poyoma 1%. rhzyal kki'an tay mkraya' na Tjavoalji hya' ga Lopakatj. tay mkyaho' na Tjavoalji hya' ga Takidis. rekisi kayal kyokay qalang Tjavoalji ga ongat kyokay. ssqoliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan pqwasan biro 'laqi' cikoy maki 1 pqwasan biro 'laqi' cikoy. pqwasan biro 'laqi' mrkyas maki 1 pqwasan biro 'laqi' mrkyas. toqi 'san baso kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbaho Uboy qqmayh
